pages.text: $(li)The Banana is an eatable item that can be used to craft $(l)Strawberry Banana Smoothie$(), $(l)Banana Ice Cream$(), $(l)Banana Bread$(), $(l)Banana Cake$(), $(l)Banana Milkshake$() or $(l)Bananaarrow$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)This item can be used to tame $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/capuchin_monkey)Capuchin Monkeys$(/l) too.

$(li)This item may be cooked in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smoker)Smoker$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/campfire)Campfire$(/l).$(br)$(li)The Dried Banana gives you ten seconds of the Agility effect, giving you the hability to climb walls.
